attributes.additional_details: The government in power is running the country into the ground. The energy cap being lifted is the major cause of the nationwide strike which are still ongoing today. The health service centers are running at minimum capacity and not being funded correctly. The taxes of the nation as mismanaged and used to line tory pockets. This needs to end before irreversible damage is done the English nation.
attributes.background: The cost of living crisis is that out of hand and has been left in the incapable hands of the tory government. A emergency election to appoint a new more capable government to handle this crisis is needed before they run the country into the ground.

rejection.details:
Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
